sqlMap.select: select ID as id, C_ADULTAIRPORTFEE as adultairportfee, C_CHDAIRPORTFEE as chdairportfee, C_BABYAIRPORTFEE as babyairportfee, C_NEARADULTAIRPOTYFEE as nearadultairpotyfee, C_NEARCHDAIRPOTYFEE as nearchdairpotyfee, C_NEARBABYAIRPORTFEE as nearbabyairportfee, C_ADULTFUELFEE as adultfuelfee, C_CHDFUELFEE as chdfuelfee, C_BABYFUELFEE as babyfuelfee, C_NEARADULTFUELFEE as nearadultfuelfee, C_NEARCHDFUELFEE as nearchdfuelfee, C_NEARBABYFUELFEE as nearbabyfuelfee, C_CREATEUSER as createuser, C_CREATETIME as createtime, C_MODIFYUSER as modifyuser, C_MODIFYTIME as modifytime, C_UCODE as ucode, C_LANGUAGE as language from T_AIRFEE where ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into T_AIRFEE ( ID, C_ADULTAIRPORTFEE, C_CHDAIRPORTFEE, C_BABYAIRPORTFEE, C_NEARADULTAIRPOTYFEE, C_NEARCHDAIRPOTYFEE, C_NEARBABYAIRPORTFEE, C_ADULTFUELFEE, C_CHDFUELFEE, C_BABYFUELFEE, C_NEARADULTFUELFEE, C_NEARCHDFUELFEE, C_NEARBABYFUELFEE, C_CREATEUSER, C_CREATETIME, C_MODIFYUSER, C_MODIFYTIME, C_UCODE, C_LANGUAGE ) values (
#id#,
#adultairportfee:DECIMAL#,
#chdairportfee:DECIMAL#,
#babyairportfee:DECIMAL#,
#nearadultairpotyfee:DECIMAL#,
#nearchdairpotyfee:DECIMAL#,
#nearbabyairportfee:DECIMAL#,
#adultfuelfee:DECIMAL#,
#chdfuelfee:DECIMAL#,
#babyfuelfee:DECIMAL#,
#nearadultfuelfee:DECIMAL#,
#nearchdfuelfee:DECIMAL#,
#nearbabyfuelfee:DECIMAL#,
#createuser#,
#createtime#,
#modifyuser#,
#modifytime#,
#ucode:DECIMAL#,
#language:DECIMAL#
)
sqlMap.update:
update T_AIRFEE set C_ADULTAIRPORTFEE = #adultairportfee:DECIMAL#, C_CHDAIRPORTFEE = #chdairportfee:DECIMAL#, C_BABYAIRPORTFEE = #babyairportfee:DECIMAL#, C_NEARADULTAIRPOTYFEE = #nearadultairpotyfee:DECIMAL#, C_NEARCHDAIRPOTYFEE = #nearchdairpotyfee:DECIMAL#, C_NEARBABYAIRPORTFEE = #nearbabyairportfee:DECIMAL#, C_ADULTFUELFEE = #adultfuelfee:DECIMAL#, C_CHDFUELFEE = #chdfuelfee:DECIMAL#, C_BABYFUELFEE = #babyfuelfee:DECIMAL#, C_NEARADULTFUELFEE = #nearadultfuelfee:DECIMAL#, C_NEARCHDFUELFEE = #nearchdfuelfee:DECIMAL#, C_NEARBABYFUELFEE = #nearbabyfuelfee:DECIMAL#, C_CREATEUSER = #createuser#, C_CREATETIME = #createtime#, C_MODIFYUSER = #modifyuser#, C_MODIFYTIME = #modifytime#, C_UCODE = #ucode:DECIMAL#, C_LANGUAGE = #language:DECIMAL#
where ID = #id#
